original_title: Royals emerge for balcony wave following King Charles’ coronation
original_body_lines: Britain's King Charles III wearing the Imperial state Crown, and Britain's Queen Camilla wearing a modified version of Queen Mary's Crown, flanked by Britain's Prince George of Wales (2nd L) and other pages of honour, wave from the Buckingham Palace balcony after viewing the Royal Air Force fly-past in central London yesterday, after their coronations. AFP
